name: Destruction of Evil Corp
description:
Description

You have been tasked to take down Evil Corp. Evil Corp is a corporation who think they can make the first form of Artificial Intelligence... We think they are idiots. Using your powers, you must stop Evil Corp and destroy the big robot hidden deep in the facility. Good luck

Controls

W A S D / Space - Movement

E - Switch matter

LMB - Interact (Levers and Batteries)

R - Reset level (In case you get stuck somewhere)

Developers

MuffinCrumbs09 (YouTube - Github- BitBucket- Itch.io)

  • Programmer
  • Artist

Its_Sky_88 (Twitch- Itch.io)

  • Artist
GameJam

This game was made in 72 hours as apart of the Novice Summer Jam Series game jam with the theme: "SOLID / LIQUID / GAS / PLASMA". 

Source Code found on BitBucket
